title: Now you see me, now you don't
creator_credit: Jim Frazier and Mantis Wildlife Films
brief_description: About the defence techniques of insects, including camouflage, mimicry, stinging spines, offensive chemicals, the ants “protection racket”, warning colors and behaviour, and portable shelters. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
